data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De Assis, Jose Eriberto, de Brito, Rafael Justino, Christoffersen, Martin Lindsey, de Souza, Jose Roberto Botelho (2015): A catalogue of the scaleworm genus Lepidonotus (Polynoidae, Polychaeta) from South America, with two new records for Brazilian waters. ZooKeys 533: 63-98, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.533.6184, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.533.6184
